attributes.action: offer graduate positions in Jobcentre Plus
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many new graduates have problems finding a job because they have no previous work experience in the job area they are applying for. Since employers value previous work experience far more than degrees graduates are discriminated against, and often have to wait for months or years before they can get a suitable job.

For this reason the Government should provide more opportunities for graduates at Jobcentre Plus, to enable them to find a job rather than continue to claim unemployment benefits.
